conbody.p: The documentation generation feature produces Excel files extracted from Design Studio models. This applies to T24 applications domain models.

T24 domain models for applications describes all application entities of the T24 Data model, replacing the PDF T24 Data Dictionary Entities. Each domain application model has a corresponding Excel file with the same name. It describes all classes corresponding to a T24 table and all enumerations. The first worksheet lists all contained classes that are detailed in separate worksheets. Generated Description come from HelpText that was imported into the -models project. So, make sure you imported Helptext prior to run this feature. The file _data_model_entities.xls summarizes all generated applications.

Documentation can be generated for:
The whole project
A package only
A single model
This applies to all types of models that the documentation generates.
